Posts.Content: Apr 23, 2012 05:35PM pawprintgirl24 wrote: i went through chemo last summer here in middle georgia it gets pretty hot! getting in the car would make me so sick feeling until the car cooled off! it was like on chemo i couldn't sweat properly.i would get like 150 degrees or so it felt like it!that was the only time i got sick was from the heat. and hot flashes!! o th ehot flases are back for me but at least i can sweat now! crazy i know! good luck!
Posts.Title: Summer Heat and Chemotherapy sandrav Shrek4
